item.title: Mark Sanchez charged with felony due to victim's 'incredibly significant injuries'
item.description: Former NFL quarterback and current Fox Sports commentator Mark Sanchez has now been charged with a felony.

item.title: Government shutdown halts data, stokes risk as economy wobbles, experts say
item.description: Federal agencies said they would not release some key data during the shutdown.

item.title: WATCH: Hundreds of hikers trapped by blizzard on Mount Everest
item.description: An effort is underway to rescue hundreds of hikers who became trapped on Mount Everest due to an unexpected blizzard.
